10/10 Would recommend

I just had to review this game one more time...

Last update from Valve, a Billion dollar INDIE developer, is just an awful cashgrab.
Want to see your in-game stats (Win/Loss, K/D, etc.)? Pay up 0.85EUR A MONTH!!!
Subscription for an IN-GAME STATS?! Doesn't Valve get a lot of money from cases, "steam tax" etc.?
So basically, when they couldn't fix their servers, for several days, they just "closed" the market, making items bought from Valve, untradable for 7 days.
They still haven't made 128 tick servers a reality, I understand that 12 BIllion dollars in revenue is not enough to upgrade your servers.
They are "fighting" cheaters, with worst anti cheat in the industry, broken Overwatch system, where 10 year-old GN1 are reviewing legit global games, but the funniest part is OVERWATCH isn't working since December, noone's getting banned trough it, because it's broken and being exploited by bots.

AND YOU WANT EXTRA MONEY FOR IN-GAME STATS? - This is a joke, unfortunately it's not April fools, guys.
By the way, you can view your K/D and other stats for free on third party sites, but you should definitely pay Valve to show them to you. Because they're doing everything they can to make your gaming experience better, NOT!
